content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana slovenia the case involves a cost procedure and the parties are discussing who should bear the costs the procedure lasted for 7 months and 21 days from november 15 2016 to july 5 2017 the final resolution of the lawsuit involves the division of a real estate property and its equipment valued at 160000 eur the parties are exspouses with the plaintiff being awarded 13 ownership of the property and receiving 10000 eur from the defendant the defendant is granted 23 ownership of the property and is required to pay 10000 eur for full ownership the decision is based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the court settlement is confidential and there is no translation available for this document
